short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the official Dino game anytime! Avoid cacti and pterodactyls if you can!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opens the official Dino game (also known as Dinasour Game) in a browser tab next to the current one. You can now play this fun game anytime you would like to. 

How to play:
To launch the game, use the space key or up arrow key. Guide the pixelized dinosaur (Tyrannosaurus rex to be exact) across a black-and-white desert landscape. Avoid oncoming obstacles by jumping or ducking to achieve the highest possible score. When your score goes up, the speed of moving objects also increases. When you achieve enough points (700 at the moment), the color changes to dark or night mode.
